Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about our pricing and plans

Are there any setup or onboarding fees?

No, there are no setup fees for either of our plans. Our team will assist you with the onboarding process to ensure a smooth start.

What is included in the Pay Per Guard option?

With our Pay Per Guard option, you pay only when you hire a guard through our platform. The $25 per guard/day fee includes access to our guard verification system, basic filtering tools, and standard support services.

What are the benefits of the Premium yearly plan?

Our Premium plan ($899/year) includes unlimited guard postings, advanced filtering options, priority support, and dedicated account management. It's ideal for businesses with regular security staffing needs.

Can I change plans as my business needs evolve?

Yes, you can upgrade from Pay Per Guard to Premium at any time. Your new Premium features will be available immediately upon upgrading.

Is there a contract or commitment period?

The Pay Per Guard option has no commitment - you only pay when you use the service. The Premium plan is billed annually and includes a full year of service.

How are guard wages handled?

Guard wages are separate from the platform fees. When you hire a guard through GuardFlex, you'll pay their hourly rate plus the platform fee. All payments are processed securely through our platform.

Ready to streamline your security staffing?
